accountRecovery.text: Account recovery requires verified contact information

backToSignIn.note: Allows user to return (i.e., go back) to the sign in page

changePassword.note: Allows user to change (i.e., modify, edit) their password

code.note: A secret code (noun) sent to the user for sign in

confirmSMSCode.note: User prompt. SMS is an acronym for Short Message Service

confirmTOTPCode.note: User prompt. TOTP is an acronym for Time-based One-Time Password

confirmationCode.note: A secret code (noun) used to help validate the user

hidePassword.note: Allows user to hide (i.e., not display) their password instead of showing it

resendCode.note: Allows user to send the code again

setupTOTP.note: TOTP is an acronym for Time-based One-Time Password

showPassword.note: Allows user to show (i.e., display) their password instead of hiding it

signIn.note: Allows user to sign in (i.e., log into) their account

signInCapitalized.note: Allows user to sign in (i.e., log into) their account

signInWithAmazon.note: Allows user to sign into (i.e., access) their account using Amazon

signInWithApple.note: Allows user to sign into (i.e., access) their account using Apple

signInWithFacebook.note: Allows user to sign into (i.e., access) their account using Facebook

signInWithGoogle.note: Allows user to sign into (i.e., access) their account using Google

signInToYourAccount.note: Prompts user to access their account

skip.note: Allows user to skip over (i.e., not complete) a section

submit.note: Displayed on a button for submitting form data

verifyContact.note: Prompts user to verify (i.e., confirm) their contact information
